author: Ash U.
comment: Seems like a good idea, but I just need to be able to easily turn background monitoring on and off from the watch. I'm not always trying to stay alert, only if I'm in class or something like that.

author: Michael Madume
comment: Include numerical values for how drowsy the watch thinks I am.

reply.author: ShareCarForAds - Quảng cáo trên xe
reply.content:
Michael, 
Awesome feedback, we actually has that info under the hood, but need a bit of work on front-end design, to make it intuitive. We'll prioritize that task now.
Cheers,
Tung

title: More information needed

author: BlueTag
comment: I already connect my gear to my phone, but it say i still need to connect
title: Damm

author: John Logan
comment: I tried the app on my moto 360 with my nexus 6 and it says I have a BPM of zero. Maybe I am dead...

reply.author: ShareCarForAds - Quảng cáo trên xe
reply.content:
Hi John, 
Thanks for trying out SleepWake and providing feedback. There's a bug that if the app is started from the watch first then it hangs. Can you please try killing apps on both devices? then start again from the phone
In any case, we are working on fixing that bug, also yours. Cheers

title: Doesn't work - thinks I am a vampire

author: Nolan Baltz
comment: Great idea but it is unable to read my heart rate.

reply.author: ShareCarForAds - Quảng cáo trên xe
reply.content: Hi Nolan, thanks for using SleepWake and giving feedback. Could you tell us your watch model? so we can investigate further. Pls either edit your comment or email us: service {at} sleepwake.me. Cheers

author: Dinico Win
comment: Crashes every time on the G Watch R...HTC one "M8", stock lollipop.. What give..my apologies...5 stars for quick reply. Cause if worked as advertised, this would be a brilliant app. I just hope you Optimized the battery consumption. I haven't seen any real drain yet, so that's a plus.

reply.author: ShareCarForAds - Quảng cáo trên xe
reply.content:
Thanks for trying SleepWake and giving feedback. We'll look into the crash and fix it. Btw, your device model shows on our end as HTC M8, not M9, can you confirm that? 
Edit: we've got your info and will fix it soon, thanks.
Update 2: we've released the fix.
Cheers.

title: Huh..

author: Viet Lam Phan
comment: An innovative solution to prevent sleeping on the road! It makes you feel safer when driving long distance.
title: Very smart!

author: Sadie Elliott
comment: Finally a watch app that's worth installing
title: Cool!
